section: The Term of this Agreement shall be for a period of [* ****] years and [*****] months commencing the 1st day of September 2004 and terminating the [*****] day of [*****].
explanation: The term is not clearly defined due to redactions ([* ****] years and [*****] months commencing the 1st day of September 2004 and terminating the [*****] day of [*****]). This makes it impossible to determine the exact duration, creating uncertainty.

section: CONSULTANT hereby gives and grants to ADAMS GOLF the exclusive right and license to use CONSULTANT'S ENDORSEMENT in connection with the manufacture, sale, distribution, advertising and promotion of PRODUCT in the CONTRACT TERRITORY.
explanation: Section 3 gives Adams Golf the right to use Consultant's likeness for advertising and promotion of Product. However, Section 2.A defines Consultant's endorsement as solely for Adams Golf's internal documentation. These two statements contradict each other, creating confusion over the scope of Adams Golf's usage rights.

section: Notwithstanding paragraphs 4A, 4B and 4C above, CONSULTANT shall be entitled to endorse and play the [*****]. The parties expressly agree that CONSULTANT may permit [*****] the use of CONSULTANT'S name and/or likeness in [*****] print and/or television advertisement provided that this is executed in a manner consistent with [*****] past [*****] advertising practice using similarly situated professional golfers with competing golf club endorsement agreements that include [*****]. If [*****] use of CONSULTANT varies from past practice of utilizing similarly situated professionals, CONSULTANT will take action to remedy the situation [*****]. If CONSULTANT participates directly in any [*****] sponsored photo shoots for advertising or PR, CONSULTANT shall wear his ADAMS GOLF [*****]. The parties further expressly agree that CONSULTANT'S endorsement of the [*****] shall not include the right to place a [*****] logo on his ADAMS GOLF [*****] or the ADAMS GOLF [*****]. If CONSULTANT'S relationship with [*****] terminates during this Agreement, CONSULTANT shall be permitted to replace the [*****] endorsement with another [*****] endorsement under the same terms and conditions expressed herein.
explanation: This section grants Consultant the ability to endorse and play with other products as long as it is consistent with [*****] past advertising practice. This introduces ambiguity as to the terms of Consultant's agreement.
